meta_title: What Is Six Sigma? Meaning, Definition & Industrial Use
meta_description: Six Sigma is a data-driven methodology used in manufacturing to eliminate defects and reduce variability. Understand its meaning, DMAIC phases, and ROI impact.
title: What Is Six Sigma?

image_prompt: A high-tech industrial control room where a diverse team of engineers in professional PPE and high-visibility vests are analyzing complex data visualizations on large monitors. The background shows a clean, modern manufacturing floor with automated robotic arms. The lighting is crisp and professional, emphasizing a "Reliability-First" high-tech atmosphere. Photo-realistic, cinematic quality, no text.
